title: Which K-pop group has the most inspiring songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well for me I think so far of me listening to music for as long as i have there have been so many artist that have inspire me and I could relate to but as time passes through it varies from one artist to another but I got to know this one kpop star BTS my interest haven't change not even for a moment they inspire me and I could relate to them and not just that but their lyrics are so power,they talk about so many thing(themselves, society,life, and so many more) which no matter who you are were you are from you can surely relate to that. well though I haven't tried any other kpop star just yet but BTS held me strong so for me I will recommend BTS song for anybody cause they put their struggles into their music and how to overcome doubt .

Stray Kids. Yes, I’m a big fan of them, but this is also coming from a non-biased point of view. Stray Kids has songs about overcoming hardships, going at things at your pace, and ignoring the voices in your head. They are the group to listen to when you’re feeling down and you can’t get up. Some good songs to listen to (and to read the translated lyrics) are: VoicesMy PaceSide EffectsLevanter (English vers. and the original song)Double Knot (English vers. and the original)The members are very supportive, and they wish to help their fans through music. I hope you give them a listen!
ITZY and BTS have many songs about self-love and self empowerment.
